creditline: The Marguerite S. McNally Endowment for Art Acquisition and gifts of funds from Thomas A. and Georgina T. Russo, Julie Jensen Bryan and Robert Bryan, Bayard Storey, Victor Keen and Jeanne Ruddy, Charles Mather III, Mary and Peter Mather, and Dr. Luther Brady
description: seated woman in profile from PL in LRQ, with long reddish brown hair wearing a blue, purple and green scarf on her head and a short sleeves blouse with blue, olive, green and rust blocks of color; radiator, LLC; large window with view of blocky, simplified buildings in shades of pink, green, dark red, blue, grey and tan; blue-green walls
title: Woman in Belgravia Hotel
